title: swaga

content: I am selling a crypto casino.The code is ready to be used as a standalone app or as starting point for your project..Demo 1: casinosource.codesAdmin login: request on DM/Telegram/Discord.ContactTelegram: t.me/script017Discord: AverageJoe#4279 (ID: 993430919983669258)..PRICES$200 source code $350 source code With slots integration$500 source code + slots integration + installation + crypto gateway setup$0 Slots and Live game APIAll future updates are provided for free!.Feel free to join our discord server:https://discord.gg/ZVZrNvdfxY.For any other feature you'd like to have just dm me on telegram/discord and we can discuss it.

comments.author: garridez
comments.body: The seller is a trustworthy and helpful man.Everything as expected.I recommend it to everyone.

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: Please keep your distance from this person if don't want to lose your money. I lost $100.00 to him last weeks.He'll act all cordial until your money hit his account. Then he'll become very aggressive and continue to procrastinate until you get fed up. Once you complain, he'll block you immediately. HE'S A SCAMMER!Use Escrow if your Life depends on dealing with him. But understand he'll do his best to push you to unknown Telegram escrow. Insist on Trusted Bitcointalk Escrowers. I bypassed that and paid dearly with my hard earned $100.Don't fall for his Gimmick, he hasn't installed anything to anyone.

comments.author: swaga
comments.body: Your previous posts explain the kind of person you are. You bought the source code from me, nothing else. I gave you $50 off and told you I'd install it for you AFTER i'm done with other work. - NO sane person would prioritize working 5 hours (voluntarily) for someone who paid $100 over people who pay full price and wait till the job is done.You kept bugging me every 30min for 5 days straight about something that YOU DIDNT PAY FOR.

comments.author: OSS117
comments.body: Hi.I tried to send you a message regarding the script, but you are not allowing newbies to contact you.Best regards.

I gave you $50 off and told you I'd install it for you AFTER i'm done with other work. - NO sane person would prioritize working 5 hours (voluntarily) for someone who paid $100 over people who pay full price and wait till the job is done.You kept bugging me every 30min for 5 days straight about something that YOU DIDNT PAY FOR. You pressured me to pay asap because were gonna travel of Friday and come back next Thursday. The moment I sent you payment, suddenly people were Queuing for your useless service? You had no one waiting in-line for yours service. Source code is not even yours. You're just a cheap scam artist who acts all cordial until money enters him hand. Then the story changes. Oh, people paid in full and were waiting in-line? What happened in those 5 days you were going back and forth, telling me you were on it, and you were gonna be gone by night? Oh, you were just lying through your teeth?The $100 you took from me for a job not done will be your downfall. You think it's just enough to be anonymous? No, it's not.

comments.author: swaga
comments.body: Quote from: Dripstoil on November 09, 2022, 04:42:12 PMQuote from: swaga on November 08, 2022, 08:02:40 PMYour previous posts explain the kind of person you are. You bought the source code from me, nothing else. I gave you $50 off and told you I'd install it for you AFTER i'm done with other work. - NO sane person would prioritize working 5 hours (voluntarily) for someone who paid $100 over people who pay full price and wait till the job is done.You kept bugging me every 30min for 5 days straight about something that YOU DIDNT PAY FOR. You pressured me to pay asap because were gonna travel of Friday and come back next Thursday. The moment I sent you payment, suddenly people were Queuing for your useless service? You had no one waiting in-line for yours service. Source code is not even yours. You're just a cheap scam artist who acts all cordial until money enters him hand. Then the story changes. Oh, people paid in full and were waiting in-line? What happened in those 5 days you were going back and forth, telling me you were on it, and you were gonna be gone by night? Oh, you were just lying through your teeth?The $100 you took from me for a job not done will be your downfall. You think it's just enough to be anonymous? No, it's not. Look buddy, I only told you to pay if you're going to pay. You wasted 4 weeks of my time. You asked SOOO MANY questions and I gave you an answer to each of them. Then you tried to lower the price from $200 to $50. And you kept begging until I agreed to $100 for source code.I told you I'd install the script for you after I was done with everything else. (Unlike some, I have private life and a real life job too.) But you just KEPT PUSHING me every 30 minutes for updates.You tempered with the source code I gave you and then accused me of giving you invalid code. Well guess what, it takes some knowledge to install it. It's not in install.exe form you dumb fuck.Believe it or not I have customers, this is not the only place where i advertise. I was trying to be helpful and nice to you but you just don't understand what the words NO and WAIT mean.I've wasted enough of my time on you and everyone with a bit of brain will understand you're just an asshole who thinks he's entitled to whatever he wants.I never ever claimed the code was mine but I DID many customisations on it. I've reported your posts to staff and hopefully they remove you so i can conduct my business in peace.
